products.author: The Beatbox Collective
products.description: Yoto Says: Two world champion beatboxers teach you how to make music with your mouth on this fun and interactive music card. Digital Card: Get instant access in the Yoto App when you buy this digital card. Play it anywhere using the app or link it to a Make Your Own Card for your kids to enjoy whenever they like. Looking for the physical Yoto Card? Find it here. This card shows that anyone can make music with just their mouths. From drum sounds, to bass guitars to DJ scratches - your guides are world champion beatboxers Bass6 and Kaila, who’ll take you on a fun interactive musical journey, complete with a beatboxing dance party finale.1. Introduction2. Hi-Hat3. Kick Drum4. Snare Drum5. All The Drums6. The Bass7. Bass & Drums8. The Scratch9. The Recap10. Beatbox Dance Party! Find out more about digital Yoto Cards, here.
products.descriptionMarkdown:
_**Yoto Says:** Two world champion beatboxers teach you how to make music with your mouth on this fun and interactive music card._

_**Digital Card:**_ Get instant access in the Yoto App when you buy this digital card. Play it anywhere using the app or link it to a **[Make Your Own Card](https://ca.yotoplay.com/pages/myo "Make Your Own Cards")** for your kids to enjoy whenever they like. Looking for the physical Yoto Card? Find it [**here**](https://ca.yotoplay.com/products/3-2-1-beatbox "3, 2, 1, Beatbox").

This card shows that anyone can make music with just their mouths. From drum sounds, to bass guitars to DJ scratches - your guides are world champion beatboxers Bass6 and Kaila, who’ll take you on a fun interactive musical journey, complete with a beatboxing dance party finale.  
1. Introduction  
2. Hi-Hat  
3. Kick Drum  
4. Snare Drum  
5. All The Drums  
6. The Bass  
7. Bass & Drums  
8. The Scratch  
9. The Recap  
10. Beatbox Dance Party!  

Find out more about digital Yoto Cards, [here](https://ca.yotoplay.com/blogs/yoto-journal/what-are-digital-yoto-cards "What are digital Yoto Cards?").
products.title: 3,2,1 Beatbox (Digital)

yotoCreatorModalProps.bodyText:
### Who are Creators on Yoto?

Creators are independent audio makers bringing their original stories, games, songs and more to Yoto Cards. We hand-pick the best and freshest ideas — so every Creators Card meets the Yoto gold standard.

[Explore the Creators Collection](/creators/)

[Read Creator biographies](https://yoto.space/creator-profiles)

cardInfoBlockProps.title: 5 for the price of 4 on all Yoto Cards
cardInfoBlockProps.copy: Get the cheapest card for free

yotoOriginalsUpsellTextBlockProps.bodyCopy: A digital version of this card is included in your Yoto Club subscription.
